about.title: Who are we?
about.description: ORIVIO is a Nigerian digital platform dedicated to guidance, mentoring, academic and professional integration, entrepreneurship, and innovation, serving high school students, graduates, university students, professionals, and the Nigerian diaspora.
about.visionDescription: To build a Niger where every young person, regardless of their region or social condition, can choose their path with full knowledge, access the right opportunities, and flourish in a dignified and sustainable academic and professional journey.
about.missionItem1: Offer personalized dual-focus guidance: academic and professional.
about.missionItem2: Connect young people to a network of qualified mentors, including those from the diaspora.
about.missionItem3: Facilitate professional integration through concrete opportunities (internships, jobs, competitions, scholarships).
about.missionItem4: Promote entrepreneurship, innovation, and continuous learning.
about.missionItem5: Create a supportive community of youth, professionals, institutions, and partners committed to the future of Niger.
